Plot: Six Californians start a club to discuss the works of Jane Austen, only to find their relationships -- both old and new -- begin to resemble 21st century versions of her novels.
Title: The Jane Austen Book Club
Actors: Maria Bello, Emily Blunt, Kathy Baker, Amy Brenneman
tomatoConsensus: Though at times formulaic and sentimental, Jane Austen Book Club succeeds on the strength of its likable ensemble cast. Even those not familiar with Jane Austen's work may find much to enjoy this lighthearted romance.
